text: Nocardiopsis chromatogenes is a bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from hypersaline soil from China.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis chromatogenes at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2006
title: Nocardiopsis chromatogenes
